attributes.review:
I could go on and on for days about how terrible this app is but Iâ€™ll spare you the vomit-inducing commentary. Just know that if 2020 was a man, he would reside in this orange idiot aka bunker boy.
A quick rundown of some key issues: it took forever to download â€” so long, in fact, that i forgot about it all together only to stumble upon it when it finished hours later in the middle of the night, and upon opening I suffered a cardiac arrest merely because a Cheeto-looking creature with emotionless black pit eyes was staring back at me. Trump can expect to be hearing from my lawyer due to the severity of the incident and the relentless flashbacks Iâ€™m  still experiencing to this day.
Another issue: once i manage to recover from the ordeal the app started malfunctioning and randomly deleting other apps like my cherished TikTok as well as somehow my twitter account started liking all of Trumpâ€™s tweets from his many meltdowns. Also i kept getting calls where all it would say is â€œITS A HOAX, ITS A HOAXâ€ in a really snobby voice. I was outraged and attempted to delete the app. It was harder to do then you may think as I couldnâ€™t hold down the app for long enough cause my phone kept glitching. Hours later, as I sobbed and shook uncontrollably, I finally managed to end the appâ€™s control over my phone. 
I never thought an app could wreck such havoc over my life but it did. I highly advise against acquiring this app. All it does is ruin innocent peoples lives for no reason other than for its own gain. 
Have a wonderful day ğŸ§šğŸ¼âœ¨â¤ï¸ğŸ˜½

attributes.review: I took the time out of my day to remove apps from my phone to make the available space to download this promising app. Upon opening it the app was already asking for my information in order to use it! Isnâ€™t it such a problem that a simple app such as this wants to take my information in order to even access the amenities that it provides! Absolutely ridiculous! If one is so worried about the great citizens of Americaâ€™s information being taken through an app that goes by the name of tik tok, then why be a hypocrite and ask for such information in order to access the app that one is so scared is being taken by another app? Does the creator only want our information being taken when it is to their own benefit?
